title: Foroys
text: Foroys (, 'Forward') was a <a href="International%20Jewish%20Labor%20Bund">Bundist</a> fortnightly <a href="Yiddish">Yiddish</a>-language newspaper published from <a href="Mexico%20City">Mexico City</a>. In the early 1960s, it had a circulation of around 2,000. Editors included I. Rotenberg, S. Jezior and S. Tsfas. "Foroys" was the organ of the "Gezelshaft far kultur un hilf" ('Association for Culture and Assistance').
